not_logged_in.en:
You are not currently logged in 

 Please click below to connect with your Google Workspace account
not_logged_in.fr:
Vous n'etes pas connecté, 

 Veuilliez cliquer le button dessous pour se logger avec votre compte Google Workspace

logged_in.en:
You are currently logged in

 Please see details below

log_in_again.en: Click the button in order to refresh the connection
log_in_again.fr: Cliquer le button pour faire connecter a nouveau.

authentication_failure.en: Oops soomething went wrong with authentication! - Please speak to the IT
authentication_failure.fr: Une erreur se produit, veuilliez contactez la service infomatique

urlFailure.en: In order to be able to call the oAuth we need a redirect URL - this is taken when the expo app is opened with the barcode, please scan a barcode
urlFailure.fr: In order to be able to call the oAuth we need a redirect URL - this is taken when the expo app is opened with the barcode, please scan a barcode

forced_dev.en: You have been forced into DEV mode
forced_dev.fr: Le mode de devleopment est activé

authentication_failure_noRecords.en: No records were retured from the auth server, bizarre! Plase speak to IT
authentication_failure_noRecords.fr: Aucun record a été retourner du serveur d'authenification, veuillie contacter la service informatique
